report.title: Explore occurrences map (standard filters, low resolution, workflow)
report.description: A list of occurrences including geometry information designed for mapping output with additional columns and parameters to support workflow. Output is aggregated to grid squares suitable for lower resolution output when zoomed out.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN index_websites_website_agreements canEdit on canEdit.from_website_id=o.website_id and canEdit.to_website_id in (#website_ids#) and canEdit.provide_for_editing=true JOIN workflow_metadata wm ON wm.key='taxa_taxon_list_external_key' and wm.key_value=o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key and wm.group_code='#workflow_group_code-unprocessed#' #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available. Can be used to generate the path in report_grid action links.

param.name: force_default_input_form
param.description: Force the defaault input form to be used instead of the one specified by the record

param.name: sq_size
param.description: Specify either 1000, 2000 or 10000 for the grid square resolution as 1km, 2km or 10km grid

joins.join: JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_1km_id and (msq.size=1000 or o.sensitive=true)
JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_2km_id and (msq.size=2000 or o.sensitive=true)
JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_10km_id and (msq.size=10000 or o.sensitive=true)

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

param.name: workflow_group_code
param.description: Code for the Workflow group to show associated records for.
param.preprocess: select '''' || string_agg(key_value, ''', ''') || '''' from workflow_metadata where key='taxa_taxon_list_external_key' and entity='occurrence' and group_code='#workflow_group_code#'

joins.join: JOIN notifications n on n.linked_id=o.id AND n.source_type='VT'
LEFT JOIN notifications n on n.linked_id=o.id AND n.source_type='VT'

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = snf.website_title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN (TRIM(snf.recorders) !~ ' ' AND LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30) THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when canEdit.id is null then null when o.input_form is null or o.website_id not in (#website_ids#) or #force_default_input_form#=1 then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end

column.name: geom
column.sql: st_astext(case when msq.size > #sq_size# then s.geom else msq.geom end)

column.name: confidential
column.sql: case o.confidential when 't' then '✔' else '✘' end

column.name: workflow_status
column.sql: case when max(get_workflow_overdue_by(o.record_status, o.record_substatus, o.query, o.created_on, wm.verification_delay_hours)) > '0 hours'::interval then 'overdue' when max(get_workflow_overdue_by(o.record_status, o.record_substatus, o.query, o.created_on, wm.verification_delay_hours)) >= '-12 hours'::interval then 'overdue-soon' else '' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case when sum(case o.record_status when 'R' then 1 else 0 end)>0 then '#d7191c' when sum(case o.record_status when 'C' then 1 else 0 end)>0 then '#abd9e9' when sum(case when o.record_status='C' and o.record_substatus=4 then 1 else 0 end)>0 then '#fdae61' else '#008837' end

column.name: sc
column.sql: case when sum(case o.record_status when 'R' then 1 else 0 end)>0 then '#a10003' when sum(case o.record_status when 'C' then 1 else 0 end)>0 then '#5095ad' when sum(case when o.record_status='C' and o.record_substatus=4 then 1 else 0 end)>0 then '#bf5e00' else '#006629' end
